dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref# 7.05.1.7
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, July 29, 2005 2:46 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref# 7.05.1.7


--
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Christine Lesiak" <christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com>
> Date: July 27, 2005 3:20:41 PM CDT
> To: e5fxt@yahoo.com, abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref#
> 7.05.1.7
> Reply-To: christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com
>
>
> NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT
>
>
> Dear Webmaster,
>
> I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
> authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
> rights. I have a good faith belief that the owner, its agents or  
> the law
> has not authorized the use of the material identified below. Please  
> promptly
> remove the infringing material and disable access to it.
>
> Name of the Intellectual Property Owner:  Primerica Financial  
> Services,Inc.
>
> Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: Trademark  
> Primerica
>
> Description of the Infringing Material: Unapproved Advertising
>
> Location of the Infringing Material: http://www.aboutprimerica.com/
>
> Date: July 27, 2005
>
> I can be contacted at:
>
> Name: Christine Lesiak
>
> Title: Compliance Specialist, Office of the General Counsel
>
> Company or Organization: Primerica Financial Services, Inc.
>
> Street: 3120 Breckinridge Boulevard
>
> City: Duluth
>
> State: GA
>
> Zip: 30099-0001
>
> Telephone:  770.564.6107  Fax: 770.279.2752
>
> Email: christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com
>
> I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.
> Signature:
>
> Christine Lesiak
>
>
> P.S.We have attempted to contact the representative who is  
> responsible for
> this ad but he does not respond.. The ad is not in compliance with our
> Trademark agreement. Please remove it from the Internet.
>
>
> The information contained in this e-mail address (including any  
> attachments)
> is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the  
> recipient's)
> named above.  This message may be an attorney-client communication  
> and/or
> work product and privileged and confidential.  If you are not the  
> intended
> recipient or responsible for delivering it to the intended  
> recipient, you
> are hereby notified that you have received this message in error,  
> please
> immediately notify us by e-mail, and delete the original message.
>
